actions.description: The annis makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (3d6 + 5) piercing damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (3d6 + 5) slashing damage.
actions.name: Claw

actions.description: 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 36 (9d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 15) if it is a Large or smaller creature. Until the grapple ends, the target takes 36 (9d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage at the start of each of the hag's turns. The hag can't make attacks while grappling a creature in this way.
actions.name: Crushing Hug

actions.description:
The hag casts one of the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13):
3/day each: disguise self (including the form of a Medium Humanoid), Fog cloud
actions.name: Spellcasting
